faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our multilingual digital services
faq.moreQuestions: Still have questions? Get in touch with our multilingual team.

1.question: What languages do you support for website development?
1.answer: We support five main languages: English, Portuguese, German, French, and Italian. Each website is fully localized including content, images, and SEO.

2.question: How long does it take to develop a multilingual website?
2.answer: Timelines vary based on project complexity, but we typically complete multilingual websites within 4-8 weeks, including all translation and localization phases.

3.question: How do you ensure translation quality?
3.answer: We work with native translators specialized in digital content. Each translation goes through a dual verification process to ensure linguistic and cultural accuracy.

4.question: Do you offer ongoing support after launch?
4.answer: Yes, we offer ongoing support packages in all languages. Our multilingual team is available to help with updates, fixes, and optimizations.

5.question: How do you optimize websites for international markets?
5.answer: We implement multilingual SEO strategies, language-specific URL structures, hreflang tags, and ensure content is culturally relevant to each target market.

cta.title: Ready to expand your business globally?
cta.description: Our multilingual team is ready to help transform your digital presence and reach new markets worldwide.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to common questions about our services.
faq.q1: What languages do you offer services in?
faq.a1: We provide services in English, German, Portuguese, French, and Italian. Our international team ensures effective communication in all these languages.
faq.q2: How does your pricing work for international projects?
faq.a2: Our pricing depends on project scope, target markets, and language requirements. We provide detailed quotes after an initial consultation to understand your specific needs.
faq.q3: How do you handle different time zones for international projects?
faq.a3: We have team members across multiple time zones to ensure responsive communication regardless of location. We also establish clear communication schedules with clients to avoid any time-related issues.
faq.q4: Can you help with localization of existing content?
faq.a4: Yes, content localization is one of our core services. We adapt your existing content for different markets, ensuring cultural relevance and linguistic accuracy.
faq.q5: Do you offer ongoing support after project completion?
faq.a5: Absolutely. We offer various maintenance and support packages to ensure your digital presence continues to perform optimally in all markets.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Support
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our multilingual contact and support services

1.question: How long does it take to get a response?
1.answer: We respond to all inquiries within 24 business hours. For urgent matters, we have a rapid response team available during business hours.

2.question: How does support in different languages work?
2.answer: Our international team provides support in 5 languages: English, Portuguese, German, French, and Italian. You can select your preferred language in the contact form.

3.question: Do you offer ongoing technical support after a project?
3.answer: Yes, we offer various post-launch support packages. Our clients can choose between basic, standard, or premium support with different levels of assistance.

4.question: How can I schedule a personalized consultation?
4.answer: Simply fill out our contact form indicating you're interested in a consultation. One of our specialists will reach out to schedule a meeting in your preferred language.

1.title: Multinational Visual Identity
1.description: Development of consistent visual identity for a technology company present in 15 countries, respecting cultural nuances while maintaining brand unity.

2.description: Design and implementation of user experience for an e-commerce platform available in 5 languages with specific cultural adaptations for each market.

3.description: Production of a series of promotional videos adapted for various international markets, with professional subtitling and cultural adaptation of content.

5.title: Rebranding for Global Expansion
5.description: Reformulation of brand identity for a company expanding internationally, with adaptations for different markets while maintaining visual cohesion.

6.title: Multilingual Design System
